body.p: Which of the following is not a major function of the digestive system?

multiple_choice.choice: Chewing food to break it down into smaller pieces
Releasing enzymes to chemically break down food into smaller units
Both secreting hormones and absorbing nutrients are not major functions of the digestive system

feedback.p: Correct. This is a function of the endocrine system, not the digestive system.
Incorrect. The digestive system must physically break down food via mehcanical digestion.
Incorrect. The absorption of nutrients is a very important function of the digestive system.
Incorrect. Enzymes must be released for the chemical digestion of the food we ingest.
Incorrect. Absorption of food is a critical function of the digestive system.

hint.p: The digestive system has several important functions which all relate to getting the nutrients from what we eat available to our body cells.
